review: Had horrible connection issues. My router was 10 feet away. Also, if you want the stick to work at all you need to use the additional power adapter, which is misleading because all the commercials make it look like you can just plug it into your HDMI port. That's not the case. If you need to use the additional power adapter you might as well buy the Amazon Fire TV.
